document.full_text: netflix inc. , the video rental company, reported better-than-expected profit and revenue, but issued an outlook for the second quarter that disappointed investors and sent shares down 5 percent.
document.title: netflix profit rises but outlook disappoints
lines_and_colors: netflix inc. , the video rental company, reported better-than-expected profit and revenue, but issued an outlook for the second quarter that disappointed investors and sent shares down 5 percent.
